name: Fontainian Foie Gras
effect:
Increases all party members' DEF by 165–235 for 300s.
In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
description: A traditional dish of Fontaine. The foie gras only needs to be pan-fried before being served. Thanks to the masterful temperature control, the golden-brown foie gras tastes enticingly tender. The process takes focus and concentration, or else the delicious liver might be liquefied into an oily mess.

suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
suspicious.description: A traditional dish of Fontaine. You feel as if you were having a spoonful of oil, and if you venture to take another bite, it is just too greasy to swallow. Did they pour in a whole jar of oil when cooking the dish?

normal.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 200 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
normal.description: A traditional dish of Fontaine. The foie gras only needs to be pan-fried before being served. Thanks to the masterful temperature control, the golden-brown foie gras tastes enticingly tender. The process takes focus and concentration, or else the delicious liver might be liquefied into an oily mess.

delicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
delicious.description: A traditional dish of Fontaine. The tender and buttery foie gras greets your tastebuds with silky dance moves before waltzing down your throat like smooth satin. Such a supreme delight makes all other dishes you will have in the future taste bland in comparison — that being said, you can hardly regret eating it, can you?
